thothbot.parallax.core.shared.scenes

Class AbstractFog

  • java.lang.Object
    • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.scenes.AbstractFog
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Fog, FogExp2

    public abstract class AbstractFog
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract realization of FogAbstract. This class implements color property only.
    Author:
    thothbot
